name: Doodled Doctor
description: Rush through several minigames, help patients, and out-do yourself. Doodled Doctor is a game that was created during the My First Game Jam Summer 2022 event, which had an optional theme around healing. The game is centered around rushing through minigames in a warioware-like fashion and getting higher and higher scores. This is my first real project and was done (mostly) solo, I hope you enjoy.
